duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform general surgical procedures with proficiency and expertise.
Collaborate with the medical staff and team to ensure comprehensive patient care.
Utilize robotic surgery techniques where suitable and advantageous for patient outcomes.
Maintain board certification and stay updated on advancements in general surgery.

education_certification.credential: MD or DO degree from an accredited medical school. Board certification in general surgery. Eligible for medical licensure in Louisiana.
